acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._tokenId: ID for the token to mint
ID for the token to mint

params._user: The address of the badge owner

params._blacklistAddress: The address of the blacklist contract
params._mintSigner: The address that can authorize minting badges
params._rootURI: Base URI for the token metadata

params._minter: The address to mint the badge to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._user: The address to set the movement for

returns._0: URI The URI for the badge

returns.balances: The amount of each badge id

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

badgeBalances(address).notice: Retrieve boolean balance for each badge

badges(uint256).notice: Token ID to badge ID mapping

canMint(bytes,address,uint256).notice: Check if a wallet can mint

getHash(address,uint256).notice: Generate a standardized hash for externally signing

getTokenId(address,uint256).notice: Retrieve a token ID given their owner and Badge ID

mint(bytes,address,uint256).notice: Mint a badge to a specific address

mint(bytes,uint256).notice: Mint a badge from the calling wallet

movementBadges(bytes32,uint256).notice: Movement to badge ID, token ID mapping

recruitmentLockDuration().notice: Duration for which a s1 badge is locked after recruitment is started

setMovement(address,uint256).notice: Sets movement for a specific address

setMovement(uint256).notice: Sets movement for the calling wallet

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Get the URI for a tokenId

totalBadgeSupply().notice: Return the total badge supply by badgeId

unlockTimestamps(uint256).notice: Mapping of badge token id to unlock timestamp

userBadges(address,uint256).notice: Wallet to badge ID, token ID mapping
